amendment.description: To decrease the authorizations of appropriations for the Federal Aviation Administration to fiscal year 2008 levels.

action.text: Amendment SA 622 proposed by Senator Paul.
Amendment SA 622 under the order of 9/15/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 61. Record Vote Number: 137.
